get.description: checks health and reachability of the service
returns a list of smart-service designs
get.summary: returns a list of smart-service designs

parameters.description: limits size of result; 0 means unlimited
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: offset to be used in combination with limit
parameters.name: offset

parameters.description: describes the sorting in the form of name.asc
parameters.name: sort

parameters.description: optional text search (mongo text index behavior)
parameters.name: search

get.description: returns a list of smart-service releases
get.summary: returns a list of smart-service releases

parameters.description: offset to be used in combination with limit
parameters.name: offset

parameters.description: rights needed to see a release; bay be a combination of the following letters: 'rwxa'; default = r; release rights are set with https://github.com/SENERGY-Platform/permission-command
parameters.name: rights

parameters.description: describes the sorting in the form of name.asc
parameters.name: sort

parameters.description: returns only newest release of the same design
parameters.name: latest

parameters.description: add 'usable' flag to result, describing if the user hase options for all iot parameters
parameters.name: add-usable-flag

get.description: checks health and reachability of the service
returns a list of smart-service instances
get.summary: returns a list of smart-service instances

parameters.description: limits size of result; 0 means unlimited
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: offset to be used in combination with limit
parameters.name: offset

parameters.description: describes the sorting in the form of name.asc
parameters.name: sort

post.description: creates smart-service modules; only usable if config.json mongo_url points to a mongodb capable of transactions (replication-set)

put.description: set a smart-service module; existing modules will be updated, missing modules will be created

delete.description: removes a smart-service instance with all modules
delete.summary: removes a smart-service instance with all modules

parameters.description: used if module delete information are invalid
parameters.name: ignore_module_delete_errors

get.description: returns parameters of a smart-service maintenance procedure
get.summary: returns parameters of a smart-service maintenance procedure

post.description: start a smart-service instance maintenance procedure
post.summary: start a smart-service instance maintenance procedure

parameters.description: sets new release id if set
parameters.name: release_id

get.description: returns a list of smart-service models
get.summary: returns a list of smart-service models

parameters.description: limits size of result; 0 means unlimited
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: offset to be used in combination with limit
parameters.name: offset

parameters.description: used if stored module delete information are invalid
parameters.name: ignore_module_delete_errors

get.description: returns a list of smart-service releases
get.summary: returns a list of smart-service releases

parameters.description: offset to be used in combination with limit
parameters.name: offset

parameters.description: rights needed to see a release; bay be a combination of the following letters: 'rwxa'; default = r; release rights are set with https://github.com/SENERGY-Platform/permission-command
parameters.name: rights

parameters.description: describes the sorting in the form of name.asc
parameters.name: sort

parameters.description: returns only newest release of the same design
parameters.name: latest

parameters.description: add 'usable' flag to result, describing if the user hase options for all iot parameters
parameters.name: add-usable-flag

post.description: creates a smart-service instance from the release
post.summary: creates a smart-service instance from the release

url.description: url receives a DELETE request and responds with a status code < 300 || code == 404 if ok

entity_id.description: to be used in combination with needs_same_entity_id_in_parameter

kind.description: optional helper for frontend to group options

needs_same_entity_id_in_parameter.description: optional, frontend should filter this option depending on selection in referenced parameter

updated_at.description: unix timestamp, set by service on creation

multiple.description: if true: Value = new([]Type); if false: Value = new(Type);

created_at.description: unix timestamp, set by service on creation

error.description: is set if module-worker notifies the repository about a error

updated_at.description: unix timestamp, set by service on creation

created_at.description: unix timestamp, set by service on creation

error.description: is set if errors occurred while releasing

created_at.description: unix timestamp, set by service on creation

error.description: is set if errors occurred while releasing

permissions_info.description: optional, set if query parameter permissions_info=true
